text_block_list.text:
The day after the Selection Race. I really am 
concerned about Daiwa Scarlet. I want to try 
again and have a proper talk with her…

I came to see her with those intentions in mind, but she was 
already surrounded by a bunch of trainers.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
It's a shame you were this close to winning the Selection Race, 
but… I'm sure you also have what it takes to win the G1!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: "Also"?

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I've got a plan! Instead of going full speed right off the gate, 
how about you save your stamina? If you can do that, you can win 
the race just like Vodka did―

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: "Just like Vodka," you say?

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Uhh… ummm…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, but I will be taking my leave now. 
…Good day, sirs.
Daiwa Scarlet left the area with an alarming smile on her face.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… I was told she's supposed to be a "well-mannered honor 
student," but… It seems to me that she has quite a temper?

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
With an attitude like that… She'll be quite the trouble to 
train, no matter how talented she is…
…I'll just try to catch up to her.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…Hm? 
Where's all that noise coming from?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Aahhh! Stop following me all day! 
I told you to give me some time to think about it!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You say that but all you've been doing is running! 
Come and join my team, Vodka! I even have overseas 
offers lined up for you, you know!?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah, I got it! 
Just leave me alone for a bit!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ah… wait, Vodka…! I won't give up… I swear I'll make you 
into the number one fastest horse girl!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: "Number one…"

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: There you are, Daiwa Scarlet.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Ah… Air Groove-senpai!? 
Um… do you need anything from me?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I'm here to give you a warning.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
As vice-president of the student council, I've come to give you a 
strict warning… Daiwa Scarlet, you've been sneaking out of the 
dorms every night lately.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Uh… I can explain…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Without any sort of prior notice… 
Breaking curfew and going out at night is inexcusable behavior.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
An honor student like yourself should be well 
aware of these rules, Daiwa Scarlet.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…I understand. 
I'm very sorry… for my behavior.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Good grief…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I take it you've been running? 
And for a considerable amount of time every night, too.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ehh… how could you tell?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It's written all over your face and the way you've been walking.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure you're aware of this, but you're overworking yourself. 
You should stop before it's too late.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: But I have to…!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I… got second place… even though my goal has always been 
being "number one"… I had to be "number one"…!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
"All horse girls eventually experience kneeling on the turf in 
defeat." Just something my mother used to say.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
What's more important is how they stand up afterwards. 
Don't be so afraid of failure.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
But it's never been the case until now! I've always been "number 
one!" I've put in all my effort just so it could stay that way!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…Senpai. 
Are you finding all of this… ridiculous?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Could I be the fool all along? Just because I was a bit faster 
than all the other kids… I ran around telling everyone I was 
number one, that I'm some kind of honor student…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …but once I finally got to Tracen Academy… I immediately lost to someone who was actually fast, like Vodka.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: When really… being "number one" was never really-

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Scarlet!!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Don't say another word. 
…You mustn't finish that sentence.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Things will never be the same.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …I'm… so horribly sorry… I'm…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I've gotta…!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What should I even do?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I… don't even know anymore!
As if grinding her teeth, she kept on muttering to herself…
I could never forget the pitiful state that she was in…
